content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --STRESU
      operator: non_empty
    - name: --STRESC
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000133
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: When --STRESU is populated, --STRESC must also be populated. Please note
  that this rule, as executed, cannot check if --STRESC is populated with the standardized
  unit.
Outcome:
  Message: Missing value for --STRESC, when --STRESU is provided
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0426
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The unit of measure for the standardized result of
                  the measurement, test, or examination.  Variable(s) Qualified, --STRESC
                  and --STRESN and --STNRLO and --STNRHI and --STREFC and --STREFN
                  and --LLOQ and --ULOQ.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Section: Findings
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: When --STRESU is populated, --STRESC must also be populated. Please note that this rule, as executed, cannot check if --STRESC is populated with the standardized unit.

Outcome.Message: Missing value for --STRESC, when --STRESU is provided

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The unit of measure for the standardized result of the measurement, test, or examination.  Variable(s) Qualified, --STRESC and --STRESN and --STNRLO and --STNRHI and --STREFC and --STREFN and --LLOQ and --ULOQ.
